entry.answer: Krishna cursed Ashvatthama to wander the earth for 3,000 years, suffering solitude and hardship, as punishment for killing the five Pandava sons. This curse ensured he would never find peace or companionship, reflecting the Mahabharata's theme of karma and divine justice.
